title: style cabbage and Gentleman’s Relish mayonnaise
description: Korean kimchi flavours meet fresh seafood.
ingredients: 8 fresh, cleaned and shucked scallops, from a good-quality fishmonger, cut into thin circles
1 lime, finely grated zest
a drizzle of coriander oil, to garnish
1/2 medium white cabbage, cored and thinly sliced
sea salt flakes
100g/3½oz caster sugar
100ml/3½fl oz white wine vinegar
6 tbsp rice wine vinegar
3 tbsp mirin
1 star anise
20g/¾oz fresh root ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, peeled and lightly crushed but kept whole
2 red or green chillies, thinly sliced
50g/2oz finely chopped fresh chervil
100g/4oz dried seaweed, rehydrated in water or dashi stock, drained and finely chopped
250g/9oz cooked brown shrimps
a little olive oil, to taste
a little lemon, to taste
a little lime juice, to taste
250g/9oz good-quality mayonnaise
42.5g pot Gentleman’s Relish or anchovy paste
a little lemon juice, to taste
